title: Can the Galaxy Book 3 Ultra beat the MacBook Pro?
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book3 Ultra is a 16-inch, 3.9-pound workstation with Intel H-Series processors and Nvidia RTX GPUs. With a 120Hz OLED screen to boot, it looks like it's going to be a super powerful and super portable workstation for professionals who want a fast and good-looking experience. But with a starting price of $2,399.99, it's almost as expensive as a MacBook Pro. We'll have to see whether these powerful chips and this high-resolution screen, can provide enough performance and battery life to compete with Apple's best. #Samsung #SamsungUnpacked #Tech   Read more:   Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:
